createAndFundCampaign(address,bytes32,ui.details: This is the efficient approach. Requires prior ERC20 approval.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createAndFundCampaign(address,bytes32,ui.notice: COMBINED APPROACH: Create and Fund in one call.

createCampaign(address,bytes32,uint256,u.notice: Create a campaign without funding it yet.

emergencyRecoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Emergency recover any ERC20 (including campaign tokens if absolutely needed).

updateMerkleRoot(uint256,bytes32).notice: Update merkle root. WARNING: Does NOT reset claimed bitmap.
